News

News For December 01, 2000
Site News - Sketsa @ 07:46 am Central

The New Povar Central Is Coming! - Sketsa
What you are currently looking at is an early look at the new Povar Central opening shortly.

I Am Seeking More Povar Central Staff! - Sketsa
I am currently on the lookout for dedicated article writers and columnists that would like to share a piece of their knowledge with the rest of the povar server community on a regular basis. No major HTML knowledge is required.

If you are interested, please send email to Sketsa Shadowdragon and I will get back to you as soon as time permits.

Found@ eq.povercentral.com

 

News For November 21, 2000
 New Server Information - Sketsa @ 05:00 pm Central

Scheduled Patch completed. Character Moves to Xev Continuing Tue Nov 21 13:39:58 PST 2000 - The EverQuest Team

The scheduled patch for today has been completed. All servers are up at this time with the exception of Povar, Tarew Marr, and Xev. The character moves to Xev are being completed and these servers will be brought up on completion.

 

News For November 19, 2000
Povar Quest News - Sketsa @ 10:52 am Central

Druid Epic Completed On Povar - Heather Stormwind

Moku of The Harmonium successfully completed the druid epic quest for the first time on Povar, resulting in a Nature Walker's Scimitar.

Found@ eq.castersrealm.com

News For November 19, 2000
Povar Guild News - Sketsa @ 10:52 am Central

Knights Of Reverence To Move - Krimlor Zerekxon

Greetings All,

I would like to take this opportunity to announce that the Knights of Reverence a Povar guild will be moving to the new server. We will move approxamitely 70 members to the new server, we are a growing guild that enjoys a good reputation on Povar. I would like to announce that we will be seeking new members of all levels on the new server. If you seek a guild that is a close family that enjoys some roleplaying and are a person of loyalty and honor please contact Sir Wulfgarr at knightsofreverence@hotmail.com

'Until we all meet on the other side may your blades strike true and your spells never falter.'-Wulfgarr Santurian

Found@ eq.castersrealm.com
